dependenciesJustification.@cloudscape-design/code-view: A component for displaying code snippets with syntax highlighting and formatting, improving readability and presentation of code in applications.
dependenciesJustification.@cloudscape-design/collection-hooks: A set of hooks for managing collections of items in a React application efficiently, providing utility functions to simplify interactions with data.
dependenciesJustification.@cloudscape-design/components: A library of pre-built UI components following Cloudscape design principles, enabling rapid development of consistent and visually appealing user interfaces.
dependenciesJustification.@cloudscape-design/global-styles: A package that provides base styles for Cloudscape components, ensuring consistent styling across all components and reducing the need for custom CSS.
dependenciesJustification.@emotion/react: A library for writing CSS styles with JavaScript, allowing for dynamic styling and theming in React applications.
dependenciesJustification.@emotion/styled: A library that enables you to create styled components using a concise syntax, enhancing the organization and reusability of styles.
dependenciesJustification.@tanstack/react-query: A powerful data-fetching and state management library for React applications, helping to manage server state, caching, and background data synchronization easily.
dependenciesJustification.pino: A fast and low-overhead logging library for Node.js applications, providing efficient logging capabilities while minimizing performance impact.
dependenciesJustification.react: The core library for building user interfaces in a declarative manner, allowing developers to create re-usable and composable UI components.
dependenciesJustification.react-dom: An essential library for rendering React applications in the browser, providing functionalities for interacting with the DOM.
dependenciesJustification.react-router: A library for routing in React applications, enabling navigation between different views, and helping manage browser history and URL changes.
dependenciesJustification.swr: A React Hooks library for data fetching that provides features like caching, revalidation, and request deduplication, ensuring a smooth user experience.
dependenciesJustification.uuid: A utility for generating unique identifiers, useful for ensuring distinct keys for items in lists or for other identification purposes.
dependenciesJustification.zustand: A small and fast state management library for React, offering a simple API for managing application state without the need for complex setups.
